message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I would like to counteroffer at $10,500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need at least $11,000 to make this worthwhile.  Let's find a middle ground.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $10,800 for the product.
Bob, I'm getting closer to your offer, but $10,800 still doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,900.  This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
